oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Certificate of enlistment for Dennis Morgan for U. S. colored troops
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: One-sheet certificate of enlistment for Dennis Morgan, a Colored man whom W. H. Morgan claims as his slave, April 5, 1864.

The U.S. War Dept. issued Gen. Order 143 on May 22, 1863, establishing a Bureau of Colored Troops. Around 175 USCT regiments with over 178,000 soldiers (about 1/10 of all Union troops) served during the last two years of the Civil War.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Morgan, William Henry, 1888-1939. ; Morgan, Dennis, 1838 - . ; United States -- Army -- African American troops. ; African American soldiers -- Records and correspondence.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: United States -- War Dept -- Adjutant-General's Office
